name: Laptop Pro 15
description: High-performance laptop with 16GB RAM, Intel i7 processor, and 512GB SSD. Perfect for professionals and developers.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life and crystal-clear audio quality.

name: Smart Watch
description: Fitness tracking smartwatch with heart rate monitor, GPS, and 7-day battery life. Water-resistant up to 50m.

name: Running Shoes
description: Comfortable running shoes with breathable mesh upper, cushioned sole, and excellent arch support for all-day comfort.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Premium non-slip yoga mat with extra padding. Eco-friendly material, easy to clean, and includes carrying strap.

name: Coffee Maker
description: Programmable drip coffee maker with thermal carafe, auto shut-off, and 12-cup capacity. Makes perfectly brewed coffee every time.

name: Office Chair
description: Ergonomic office chair with lumbar support, adjustable height, and 360-degree swivel. Perfect for long work hours.

name: Desk Lamp
description: LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Touch controls and USB charging port included.
